title: How to Find Your Train
en: Use the PTV Journey Planner to plan your train trip. Enter your starting point and destination to see next services and platform information. This helps you find the best route for your journey.

title: Touch On at Station Gates
en: Touch on with your Myki card at the station gates to enter. Hold your card to the reader until it beeps and the gate opens. Always touch on before boarding the train.

title: Waiting on the Platform
en: Wait behind the yellow line on the platform for safety. Watch the screens for train arrival and platform information. Stay alert and be ready to board when your train arrives.

title: Boarding the Train
en: Let passengers off the train before you board. Enter carefully and find a seat or a safe place to stand. This helps keep boarding smooth and safe for everyone.

title: Seating and Safety on Trains
en: Find a seat or hold the rail while the train is moving. Keep your bags off spare seats so others can sit. Being considerate and safe makes travel better for everyone.

title: Getting Off the Train
en: Alight carefully at your stop and follow the exit signs. Watch your step as you leave the train. This helps you exit safely and find your way out of the station.

title: Touch Off at Exit Gates
en: Touch off with your Myki card at the exit gates to finish your trip. Hold your card to the reader until it beeps and the gate opens. This ensures you pay the correct fare.

title: Printable Train Guides
en: Official train guides are available as PDFs in multiple languages. These guides explain how to travel by train in Victoria. Download and print them for easy reference.
